mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mall_question ORDER BY question_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall_question VALUES (mall_question_seq.nextval, #{user_idx}, #{goods_idx}, #{question_title}, #{question_contents}, sysdate, 0, null, null)
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_question SET question_isreplied=#{question_isreplied}, question_reply=#{question_reply}, question_reply_date=sysdate WHERE question_idx=#{question_idx}
